name: Carrot Spaceball
description:
Carrots playing basketball in a spaceship in the middle of their space adventure.

Just a simple 2D singleplayer/local-multiplayer one-on-one basketball, with simple control.

Play with keyboard or gamepad.

Game Controls:

P1

  • left: ←
  • right: →
  • jump: spacebar
  • throw: spacebar (while in air)

P2

  • left: A
  • right: D
  • jump: left Ctrl
  • throw: left Ctrl (while in air)

Esc to quit.

Game controllers supported:

  • left: ←
  • right: →
  • jump: button A
  • throw: button A (while in air)

How to play?

  Fetch the ball, by touching it.

Press the action button (P1: spacebar, P2: left Ctrl, or button A on gamepad) to jump.

Then, press the button again mid-air to throw the ball.


Avoid the bot!

It makes you drop the ball.

It vacuums the ball back to the center.

Block your opponent.

  Use the springboard to jump higher~

Defend your side and throw the ball into opponent basket to score

Ideal shooting location

Your score is displayed on your side

Hope you enjoy the game
